name: Minecraft Clone - Block Island
description:
This Minecraft Clone is a hobby project and is available to free download.

Create your own island with 256 blocks and models, partially animated.

The game was created within 7 years without programming knowledge.

It has little mistakes and it was improvised a lot, but it is playable and you can shape beautiful cities, islands, etc.

A big test world is included as a SaveGame in the game. There all blocks and models are installed in a small fantasy world.

Block Island is not developed further. If interested to the Source code, please PM.

Language: German  Created with Unity. 2018.1.6.1
